resources.string: Current playing or last song title
A simple file manager will be in this activity. It will show the folders of the device and allow the user to select a file or multiple to play instantly or add the to a playlist.
A list with the stored playlists made by the user will be here. Also there will be buttons to create new playlist or start playing the songs in a playlist
This activity will have a limited number of large buttons for play/stop next previous and select playlist for easy use while driving

This activity will show some artwork of the current song, the title, a seek bar for the duration, the main play control buttons and a button for loading a playlist. In order to play the music it will use the MediaPlayer class provided in the Android multimedia framework.
This main screen will help the user navigate the app and provide him with options for playing the music he wants. Either from a predifined or newly created list or instantly the last played song.
